item.description:
Start the new year off right, meeting new friends and hopefully someone special for 2010.

Dance / Mingle / Party with hundreds of singles from all over Mass. & NH

Downstairs Ballroom / Foyer with Fireplace / Hot & cold hor's douevres thru out the evening / Free Coffee & desserts

Proper dress required, which means look nice, but no jeans/sneakers.

Tables can be reserved for you and your friends.

$15 cover get there early, this event could be sold out.

If you have any questions/comments/suggestions/requests just let me know.

www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com for more info.

Sign up for a chance to get in free for you and a friend, just email WhatsAngeloDoing@comcast.net
Winners name will be posted at the door.
item.name: New Years Eve Singles Dance!
